pageContext.claim: “Those that worked with me in this incredible Midterm Election, embracing certain policies and principles, did very well. Those that did not, say goodbye! Yesterday was such a very Big Win, and all under the pressure of a Nasty and Hostile Media!”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats rode a blue wave to take control of the House, gaining a net 40 seats. Polls show the Democrats' victory was largely a repudiation of Trump and his policies.
